Author: ReMoneta
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: ANNOUNCEMENT  Thank you all for showing ReMoneta and the team a lot of support. Our community is important to us as we continue to grow. We see many new members joining our referral community, initiating discussions and asking questions about ReMoneta and its products, which is great!  We would like to announce the success of our first stage.  ReMoneta is moving to the next stage of its development. To reflect this, we have updated our website. ReMoneta consists of an underlying platform for creating disruptive products and a developing a number of products connected to that platform for the financial and technological benefit. During the next stage, we have now started the development and promotion of the individual products that will be running of the platform.  You can head over to www.ReMoneta.com to read more.  The initial products being developed are shown below:  1. ReMoneta currency - the only currency in the world which increases in value over time. Imagine a cup of coffee which is cheaper tomorrow than today! 2. EXIT - allows anyone, anywhere, anytime to exit crypto into USD or vice versa, exit traditional currencies into cryptocurrencies for a fraction of the price of any of our competitors. 3. LAND - a token backed by 100% land and offering a long-term secure value which increases over time. 4. SYNC - Disrupting the gaming industry. Mobile gaming is a billion-dollar industry, with some games seeing an average user spending more than $500 for in-app purchases. ReMoneta offers real micro-pricing (e.g. spending $0.01 cents per transaction), which can open up a host of new possibilities. For gaming companies, this means bringing in millions of new users who were reluctant to spend money on in-app purchases, increasing their revenues considerably and for gamers - more fun, as well as features increasing the number of players, loyalty, and allowing gamers to earn financially while they play.  Many people from our community have asked if they can invest in any of our products. We do not have a public sale, however, for individual questions please e-mail info@remoneta.com directly. We welcome your continuing feedback and involvement!

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Both retailers and community members are rewarded. Retailers for being part of the system and based on the number of transactions Members for developing the community (eg. admin/ support, bringing new members, bringing new retailers) and by publicly promoting the community shared values (human health, global unity, animal welfare, environment and clean energy).   Quote from: Kavorka on September 14, 2018, 07:46:59 AM I read that Remoneta will be backed by land,therefore making it more stabile.Can you please explain that,how its going to work?  Land is one part of the solution. A dual token system with one token not traded (so it cant be anything but the price we set), land means steadily increasing value over time and of course is a long term stable model and the highest value-increasing asset over the longer term (see Philosophy paper on www.ReMoneta.com) and an intelligent computer model determining the ReMoneta price.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Yes, during the beta test, see www.ReMonta.com under Currency for the times.   Quote from: HakiMikkinen on September 13, 2018, 11:43:00 PM What are some main features of your wallet?   The project is not about a wallet particularly. The wallet is a small part of the total system which just holds the tokens. See www.ReMoneta.com/Currency for more  Quote from: Lightmotiv on September 14, 2018, 12:02:14 AM Quote from: constructive_criticism on September 13, 2018, 08:15:36 PM Does someone know if the projects token is minable?  As far as I know it is not minable is a standard traditional sense.  Indeed not traditional, but we hope better. Instead of a random computer code generation based on the most powerful computer, the miner takes concrete actions in the real world (see my earlier post today) and based on those actions he is rewarded. So you control this yourself, it is not random. That means you control it, you plan it and as much as you want to earn is up to your own actions.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: First the community should build the initial functionality. But we are open to any good, new suggestions and this can be added to the action list. Everyone is welcome to make suggestions here, we will keep that list. Don't be worried about writing something crazy - sometimes that can be a great idea.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Hi, stable doesn't mean a single price. We have a stable increase in price over time. Think about land prices. Very stable but increase steadily over time. In a sense, the best of both worlds. ReMoneta is the only currency in the world which steadily increases in price (not falling like fiat or volatile like crypto - either ETH, BTC, gold-backed or Tethered... they all fall in value or are volatile).

Author: ReMoneta
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Hello everybody! I hope your week started out great!  Here's an update on ReMoneta's recent activities, especially for those not following us on Telegram. The whole team is still working hard, we have not disappeared anywhere and we don't intend to!    * Liina attended Voice of Blockchain in Chicago at the end of last month. Read the summary here: https://medium.com/remoneta/remoneta-was-invited-to-the-voice-of-blockchain-4a00a45e3845  * Hadley will be visiting Angel Island in Amsterdam in just a few weeks! They put is best: "Breaking the traditional pitching and investor meetings, Angel Island connects the unconnected and brings together the bravest and the most brilliant minds every year to combine the resources that will contribute to a sustainable future." Stay tuned for how the meetup goes!  Official date: September 26th, 2018  * CryptoMondays in Washington DC! Crypto Oracle started a great event series across the world for likeminded people to get together and discuss crypto and blockchain. Liina will be there on September 24th as a co-host! Come say hi if you'd like OR find your city here: https://www.meetup.com/pro/cryptomonday  * ReMoneta website will be going through a slight renewal very shortly. Let us know if you have any suggestions, and we may be able to implement it!  * You can now read about ReMoneta on our Bitcoinwiki here: https://en.bitcoinwiki.org/wiki/ReMoneta  * Future events! Hadley will be visiting more events in the near future, check back here or on our Telegram channel to find out when and where.  * PS! Anyone still interested in buying, please contact info@ReMoneta.com directly for more information.      Check out our referral program! ReMoneta.com/maitre. Every referral you make gets you 100 RET tokens. Whereas the token sale is closed, the referral program is open until the end of October.   Quote from: Samson_bbl on September 08, 2018, 07:30:03 AM This looks like so legit i do background check and search the team members and they are real in this kind of work or company.  We are all most definitely real! There is quite a bit of information available online about the team members, and some of the other big companies and projects they are or have been involved with.   -Liina

Thanks for the information and I wish the project to reach all the goals set!

Author: ReMoneta
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Hi, yes, it's actually part of our community mining. Check out the Philosophy paper on our website, page 30. "Community members will invite new partners/ retailers join the network. When they join, the new partner indicates in the registration form which member introduced them to the network. Total ReMoneta rewards will be divided equally by total number of new partners or retailers and distributed accordingly to members who introduced them."  Quote from: FrankDTank on September 07, 2018, 09:20:02 AM Does ReMoneta team  have a plan to prevent pump & dump and price manipulation after the token sale?  There is a lock in period for all. First 10% will be distributed directly a month after the official end of the sale period (Oct 31st), and the rest will be distributed evenly across 6 months. Founders have a 6-month lock in for example, and the rest is distributed over 2 years. The token allocation info is also on the website - www.ReMoneta.com.   Quote from: WillerTex on September 07, 2018, 03:56:32 PM Are there some countries that were not able join the sale,or everyone was  welcomed?  For the token sale we did have to exclude US, China, South Korea, Singapore due to regulations. For the ReMoneta netwrok etc, everybody is welcome .  -Liina

Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: The same as listed on the site and in the documents documentation, end of the private sale + 30 days. End of the private sale is set for 31st October.   Quote from: Samson_bbl on September 01, 2018, 01:39:52 PM You plan  to build your smart contracts on top of ethereum blockchain. We all knows that ethereum can handle ~30tps. How will you solve the scalability issue?  We have 2 tokens. RET (on Ethereum) and ReMoneta on an adapted-hyperledger. The Ethereum solution exists so we have instant wide use for the RET token. We have designed our own solution for Hyperledger which gives the scalability. So we are not limited by Ethereum. Quote from: BoDerek on September 01, 2018, 01:09:52 PM   Do you have any estimate for 2019 revenue, whats the expected number?  Value to token buyers is not impacted by the revenue. We are not selling shares in the company. Have a look at the WP/Philosophy paper on www.ReMoneta.com for more information.   Quote from: Art Vandelay on August 31, 2018, 03:27:02 PM Where exactly is your headquarters and how  big your team is?   In Estonia (European Union). 18 people are involved in the team list at the moment. Plus of course quite a few more busy with IT, development and so on.   Quote from: Hilderman on September 01, 2018, 01:24:51 PM I think that  most important thing for any project is that it solves real world problem,and Remoneta  is  doing  excatly  that!  It does a few things, perhaps most interesting is that is olves the real world problem of falling price currencies. All currencies in the world fall in price like and/or are volatile like crypto. ReMoneta increases consistently and predictably in price. Imagine if the currency you hold increases in price, so tomorrow a cup of coffee is cheaper than today... There is a lot more to it, see www.ReMoneta.com

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Sure, this is community mining. It is a concrete way for members to earn (so its not just speculation but real actions driving the community forwards which are rewarded). We did write an overview here, but you can see the real details in the Philosophy paper on www.ReMoneta.com

Author: Philip Ruby
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: I you read more abut ReMoneta then you find out that sustainability and being environmentally friendly is one of the core ideas of ReMoneta. They have reasoned it in a following way:  "Slightly above we were talking about the land that ReMoneta holds and how it is used. For example, when renting out land, the activities done on that land should align with our positive values - e.g. organic farming, children's playgrounds, helping wild animals, green energy. Similarly, we encourage the community to also support these similar values. If a community member supports these same values, and drives these values, then this is also a part of our community mining (rather than using a lot electricity for more conventional mining for e.g. Bitcoin)."

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: The proof of concept is already complete. After a few weeks we had over 80,000 people in our referral community actively doing a similar activity that will be continued in community mining after the system goes live. 80k in a few weeks scales up to about 500,000 people by the launch. All people who will want to use their tokens. (or maybe some who just want to hold them a while). If we already have this number before the launch, its not a stretch to say we will have some millions once we really kick off after the launch and the ReMoneta starts to be actively used. That is already a very good community.  But of course, we have a strong marketing and implementation plan, many features attracting people and lets not forget the whole core of ReMoneta is this same community bringing new retailers, members, spreading positive values around the world. ReMoneta was completely built around the community. Its not about the team alone, its about the community and us as a part of that. This then becomes a very powerful force to drive adoption.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: It is a dual token system. RET is an erc20 token and can be stored on any compatible erc20 wallet. RET is sold in the private sale, can be used for all Ethereum functionality and this is what all our members use until the ReMoneta network goes live.  ReMoneta runs on the ReMoneta network (adapted hyperledger). This has its own system/ wallet and it goes live in April 2019. At that time you can exchange 1:1.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Actually the land purchase is quite easy to monitor. In the Philosophy Paper on www.ReMoneta.com we have outlined the purchase strategy. This sets various metrcs, like countries, type of land, increasing value of the land, type of land we will choose. Buying happens according to those criteria which is monitored at 3 levels, SPV (company holding the land), board and advisory board level. The land data is entered on the blockchain for all members to follow, so the community has open access to the portfolio data and can follow everything. Anyone who chooses can be involved in the whole process at any stage.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Yes, you can read about how this works in our Technical Paper, www.ReMoneta.com, scroll to the bottom.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Yes, I was just the keynote moderator at CryptoBlockCon in New York. Liina is at rhe Voice of Blockchain in Chicago right now... connect to our Telegram to keep up with th real time updates of events and where we are.  Quote from: Vargistkrieg on August 24, 2018, 05:47:39 PM Quote from: Ranunculus2 on August 24, 2018, 03:27:24 PM Quote from: Beltalowda on August 24, 2018, 12:24:33 PM Quote from: cmdr1 on August 24, 2018, 09:56:52 AM Quote from: Goldigger456 on August 24, 2018, 08:25:10 AM Is proof of care still going on,or its over?  Could someone elaborate on this proof of care concept here?  Well it is not complicated, you do something beneficial to the project to prove that you really care about the project.  Makes sense. But what is implied as care? Just bounty videos or sth else too?  Yeah, what is proof of care? I know of POV but don't know what POC is.  The idea about care, is that you care about the project. So.. you might just buy tokens to get a personal benefit, you might do a bounty program to get a personal benefit, but the idea is that you care,  if you get benefits for yourself and also act to help the project.  In practice this is done by buying tokens and taking actions which support the development of the project (like increasing the awareness similar to a bounty-type action). Your bonus is then on top of your purchase - you care for the project... and the project cares for you.

Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Quote from: SoonAmoon on August 17, 2018, 01:38:00 PM Quote from: hurryUp8 on August 17, 2018, 10:31:41 AM Quote from: SpockSenior on August 17, 2018, 10:27:51 AM Quote from: Miklia on August 17, 2018, 09:49:08 AM Quote from: BoutrosBoutrosGhali on August 17, 2018, 06:56:43 AM Check this interesting article for additional info about ReMoneta   https://medium.com/remoneta/how-remoneta-will-take-cryptocurrency-mainstream-473f89674355  Thank you for sharing that,alot of info for those that are too bored to read whitepaper  It doesn't really have as much info as a whitepaper. But also this part "ReMoneta has designed a series of features which make it appeal to the mass audience. The first is accessibility. ReMoneta has “anyone, anywhere, anytime” access. Anyone with a web browser, whether mobile or computer can easily access ReMoneta and use all the functionality through its Functional Hub service to the blockchain. Technical users can connect directly, use their own online/offline wallets and do everything as normal, but the added simplicity is what allows the mainstream to like and use ReMoneta."  I am interested in how this 'Technical users' term will apply ? who are technical users?  Whitepaper is always have full info, there is no need of putting whole whitepaper in a single article  That's where those one-pager come in handy. They show the crucial info without the need to read so much of the tech spec.  That is true. But I have to ask the same question as well - what is a technical user?   ...a "technical user" is someone who has a good understanding of the blockchain and how to integrate into it/ perhaps program parts of it. He is compared to a regular user who just wants to use the system as quickly and easily as possible.      Have a look at www.ReMoneta.com/bonus - it gives a short and useful overview and you can choose from any of the bonuses.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: so does it count as a more stable option to be linked to property/land even though it can also be volatile? [/quote]    Its great to see some community members discovering the real benefits of ReMoneta. This is exactly on-topic.  ReMoneta could indeed (partly) replace traditional currencies in this situation. Since the price of ReMoneta is stable and steadily increasing, this crash does not take place (the second token RET floats and can rise of fall in price). There is land is backing the system for trust, security and stability, but it does not determine the price of ReMoneta. The price is determined by a long term computer model, thus any short term fluctuation in land values are just that - short term changes in the balance sheet but not the price of ReMoneta. The price is stable and rises. The land value may rise and fall in the short term, however, as we see over the long term it hits a strong upward trend, so the value of the whole system increases. In this case you get the benefits from both sides of the coin, real increasing price of ReMoneta and long term increasing value of the underlying companies/system.  We are happy to answer any questions about the details of this.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: At the moment there is no option that exists to pay micropayments, for instance 0.1c, say for streaming per second, gaming, services, electricity, new products, conversion from freeware to micro-paid-ware and so on. ReMoneta introduces this new market. It is only possible with the features ReMoneta brings. We have an article about this topic, for more details, see  https://medium.com/remoneta/remoneta-micro-payments-will-create-a-completely-new-industry-ba7f7d3af0ed

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Hi, in general you are right, that is why we do things differently than the general market. We have a dual token system. RET will be integrated with the Bancor network, ReMoneta will not be listed or traded anywhere. ReMoneta is designed to have a stable and predictably increasing price, determined by a computer model. ReMoneta cannot be priced any differently than the price we set, since it cannot be bought or sold anywhere else than on the ReMoneta network.   Quote from: Vargistkrieg on August 11, 2018, 11:01:17 AM Quote from: PujuTravala on August 11, 2018, 10:32:07 AM Can you give us some info how you plan to spend funds raised during ICO?  I don't know what their plans are, but I would guess some of it goes to successful further research and development of the project and some to project maintenance, legal fees etc...  Would be nice if someone from the team answers this so we don't speculate.   ..this can be found on www.ReMoneta.com and in the White Paper on the same page

Author: ReMoneta
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Here is a list of key benefits ReMoneta aims to generate:  - A highly secure network with added features over normal blockchains such as “follow the money”;  - Zero costs forever on the ReMoneta network. No transaction costs. No start-up costs. No installation costs;  - Micropayments which will open up a whole new industry;  - Up to 12 million microtransactions a second using time-sliced consolidation. Regular transactions are 500x faster than currently on the Ethereum network.  - A very concrete earning potential. It does not depend on price rises like most cryptocurrencies, but you take real world actions for which you are rewarded. At zero cost you can set up your own solutions or businesses on the ReMoneta network;  - There is long term real value to the system provided by land;  - The system acts to stabilize global commerce;  - We introduce shared global values into consumer and retail decision-making which makes a real positive impact on the world.    -Liina

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: The community members are the same as the customers using ReMoneta to pay, so they are rewarded. The reward for community members is called community mining and is a reward for promoting the community, currency and the shared community values - environment, global unity, clean energy, human health and animal welfare.  The reward works this way: people take actions in the real world, for instance, bringing new members, writing an article promoting an important topic about the environment, bringing new retailers on board, or even donating to a organisation with the same values. Any of these and other topics are rewarded. More details can be found in the Philosophy paper on www.ReMoneta.com.  This leads to a positive feedback loop.. more positive impact on the world, more reward, more promotion of ReMoneta, more demand for ReMoneta to increase the reward, more development of the community and positive impact on the world, more reward and so on...

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: It solves the biggest problem in crypto and perhaps fiat currencies - giving real, measurable value and trust to the system. No leverage (loans) against the land, it is 100% real solid value backing the company ReMoneta. During the last 200 years, land has risen in value more than gold (on average it did not rise) and even shares surprisingly enough. It also means there is a huge value behind the system, without any claim against it - that makes it very hard for the system to fail - as you can imagine it would take many years without any income at all to use up even the initial land value in a cautiously managed organisation. Plus the land generates ongoing income to cover costs so this extreme situation should not even occur, making it all the more sold, stable and lasting.  ReMoneta also uses a dual token system and pricing controlled by an intelligent long term computer model. So the price is predictable and rises in a stable fashion over time. This solves the issue of all currencies not being a true store of value.   Quote from: LogitechM590 on August 20, 2018, 05:19:39 PM Quote from: HadleyBarrett on August 20, 2018, 05:11:46 PM  Do you mean during the operational stage of the project? The initial marketing budget is available to view on www.ReMoneta.com and in the White Paper at the same address  Do you plan any more sale phases,or thats it,no more tokens available for that?  At the moment there are no open sales planned, but you can contact Info@ReMoneta.com if you are interested to discuss.

Author: ReMoneta
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Just a quick comment to say we have a new article up on Medium based on the recent outlook report by Goldman Sachs.  "Are cryptocurrencies really currencies? An analysis of Bitcoin and ReMoneta in a falling market"  Read it on Medium here: https://medium.com/remoneta/are-cryptocurrencies-really-currencies-an-analysis-of-bitcoin-and-remoneta-in-a-falling-market-14e440d5753b           We have cut our information into two, and therefore we have a simpler Whitepaper and then a Philosophy paper. The latter being more detailed. Having said that, I personally recommend reading through all of them. Not just for our project, but for all projects you are looking at. It not only gives you a full overview of the benefits of the project, but it also helps to understand the risks. Or as a more extreme but common example, one pagers may contain all the exiting numbers to make you want to buy, but it's the full whitepaper that gives you the relevant information to understand whether they are scammers, inexperienced, or perhaps unrealistic in their goals. Author: johnmiles
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Here is some good explanation.  A non-disclosure agreement (NDA) is a legal contract between two or more parties that signifies a confidential relationship exists between them. The confidential relationship exists because the parties share information among themselves that should not be made available to any other parties outside of those involved, such as competitors or the general public.  Source: https://www.investopedia.com/terms/n/nda.asp

Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Hi all!  The 2nd sale did happen last week and closed last Friday as planned. There was no delay this time by the way. I believe the delay one user was referring to was the one in July. If you have any specific interest in purchase, you can also contact info@remoneta.com. I think if you google it you will find a term "non-disclosure agreement", I think that is some sort of agreement what should be secret  Here is some good explanation.  A non-disclosure agreement (NDA) is a legal contract between two or more parties that signifies a confidential relationship exists between them. The confidential relationship exists because the parties share information among themselves that should not be made available to any other parties outside of those involved, such as competitors or the general public.  Source: https://www.investopedia.com/terms/n/nda.asp    Yeah, probably should google it first. Tnx guys anyway   We had one announcement regarding Bancor already some time ago. See here: https://medium.com/remoneta/remoneta-ret-token-to-join-the-bancor-network-e8dae083d84     In the meantime, our CEO, Hadley, will be joining the CryptoBlockCon as a key moderator on August 15th, and I will also be joining him for the conference. Author: Philip Ruby
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: They have explained land backing in their Telegram chat the following way (I just copy-pasted):  The use of land backing is to give stability to the currency. First, you have a large value backing the currency, so it is not just "hot air" or based on future promises which might never be realised - even fiat currencies like the dollar rise and fall due to political and economic vagaries of the US. We even beat fiat currencies in that way. It solves the problem a lot of people have been talking about that crypto has no real value. Now it does. Second, land is a stable asset, so it is better for creating a stable-priced currency, its more secure and safe. Third, land has always increased in value and over the long term it is the best asset for storing value (see the white paper Philosophy, there is a study by Oxford Unviersity looking at the last 200 years of different asset values). Trust, security, real value, stability. These are some of the core concepts of ReMoneta.

Author: cmdr1
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: I don't agree that land has always increased in value. It largely depends on the country stability and start land value. But it does make sense if the location is really good.

Author: Philip Ruby
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: This is also from their FAQ  They ise community mining and explain it the following way:  In keeping with the company’s values of unity and sustainability, ReMoneta places great emphasis on creating a community, rather than just a currency.  As such, rather than using the usual energy intensive method of cryptocurrency mining to create new coins, ReMoneta offers rewards to users for taking actions that support and expand the ReMoneta community by bringing in new members, retailers, and service providers, or by promoting the community’s shared values. The system is monitored and approved by the community itself.

Author: Philip Ruby
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Choosing good locations and land units which enable value increase is also discussed in more detail in their philosophy paper. It is a bit longer than white paper, but I recommend reading it, a lot of valuable information.

They have explained land backing in their Telegram chat the following way (I just copy-pasted):   [/quote]  I don't agree that land has always increased in value. It largely depends on the country stability and start land value. But it does make sense if the location is really good. [/quote]  Yes, over the long term is the meaning. For more information on this, see the Oxford university study looking at land prices during the last 200 years in our Philosophy Paper, www.ReMoneta.com. Our pricing is based on an intelligent computer model set again the long term value. It is not impacted by short term or geographic fluctuations, neither is the land portfolio since it is a global portfolio so it averages out any country-specific effects.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Ok, this is how this works: We have RET and ReMoneta. RET is an ERC20 token sold in the token sale which runs on Ethereum. So you can use it right away on the Ethereum network. RET us floating in price/ tradable. ReMoneta runs on the ReMoneta (adapted-hyperledger network). This gives all the benefits listed in the WP. ReMoneta has an intelligent computer model-controlled price, is stable and increasing and cannot be traded. Anyone who buys during the token sale can swap RET to ReMoneta at any time 1:1. You can swap back any time you like at the market price for RET.

Author: Philip Ruby
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: This is how they have explained it in their FAQ:  How is ReMoneta different from other online currencies?  There are a lot of differences, but here are some key points:  - We are the only currency we know where the companies are backed by land, giving long-term stability and security to the companies;  - Dual-token system where the price of RET floats, and ReMoneta is stable;  - “Anyone, Anytime, Anywhere” approach. Zero transactions costs, near instant transaction speeds, open to everybody.  - Community mining, where you are rewarded for promoting positive shared values and expanding the community.  - In fact all the differences combined are what is needed to allow Crypto to Connect to Commerce and then we can take Crypto to the mainstream.

Author: Philip Ruby
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: The use of land backing is to give stability to the currency. First, you have a large value backing the currency, so it is not just "hot air" or based on future promises which might never be realised - even fiat currencies like the dollar rise and fall due to political and economic vagaries of the US. We even beat fiat currencies in that way. It solves the problem a lot of people have been talking about that crypto has no real value. Now it does.  Second, the land is a stable asset, so it is better for creating a stable-priced currency, it's more secure and safe. Third, the land has always increased in value and over the long term, it is the best asset for storing value (see the white paper Philosophy, there is a study by Oxford University looking at the last 200 years of different asset values). Trust, security, real value, stability. These are some of the core concepts of ReMoneta.

Body: Hi, it is only 100k, so we expect this should be sold out directly to the most keen buyers.   Quote from: El Topo on August 07, 2018, 08:10:04 AM Quote from: NetFreak199 on August 07, 2018, 07:56:04 AM Maybe we should link to personal accounts in LinkedIn for team members? To make sure they're real people. Your harcap is $ 5000000 is that really enough? I have a technical problem when I click on "buy coin". So can you tell me how much the coin is worth?   You are welcome to look at the Linked-in details of all the team members, go to Linked-in and type "ReMoneta", you will see the team members connected to the project.  For now the sum was our target. Unlike most projects we can actually use more money practically because it will buy more land which increases the stability and value of the total system. So, yes, you can say more is better. However in this first hard cap, as someone else wrote here, its better not to be greedy.  Quote from: descuri on August 07, 2018, 07:33:05 AM Quote from: BoutrosBoutrosGhali on August 07, 2018, 06:32:33 AM Quote from: JeffTheMan on August 07, 2018, 02:19:26 AM Quote from: DammeClaudeVanJean on August 06, 2018, 05:14:43 PM Quote from: Vargistkrieg on August 06, 2018, 02:52:11 PM Quote from: dimaVODKA on August 06, 2018, 02:19:28 PM If I'm not mistaken,only 2 %of the tokens are reserved for founders? That must be some kind of record.  Are you referring to it being a small amount? Yes, but think of it in terms of how much that is if the project succeeds, and I'm sure they are counting on that.  I think he wanted to say that team is modest,and in the same time sure that with will  succeed!  It is commendable.Very rare from a team indeed.Shows that team really knows what they are doing and that they believe in the project fully.  Thats one of the reasons that makes me believe this will be huge success!  2% for founders, but how much for the whole team? I don't think one includes the other?  2% for team and founders. The idea is that we benefit only when the project is successful, not just getting money for nothing.   Quote from: KureBabino on August 07, 2018, 02:03:01 AM Can we buy Remoneta with credit card on Wednesday too?   We have payment options in ETH, BTC, USD, Eur, Yen, GBP and any cryptocurrency using ShapeShift, but not credit cards. Author: Maurizio7878
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: [/quote]  Can you tell use more about that remoneta token,and its purpose? [/quote]  Mm, its a broad question. Lets say it like this, the goal of ReMoneta is to improve how the world works. That may be a bit philosophical (see our Philosophy Paper on www.ReMoneta.com), but I will explain it.  There are some great benefits for buyers - good possibilities to earn from bonuses, exclusive rewards for private sale buyers, community mining where you earn based on what you do, opportunities to set up a business, amongst other things. But that is only half the story.  We believe you should earn but at the same time drive positive change in the world. This happens in two ways. First the land backing means the ReMoneta token (its a dual token system, RET and ReMoneta) will help to stabilise the financial system. This is because ReMoneta has stable (predictably increasing) prices and is backed by real, measurable value - land. It is not based on loans from banks created from thin air, it is not based on future promises, countries which need to continue to grow in order to generate economic benefit or any kind of "hot air". It is based on land. You can live on it, grow crops on it... it is very real. Second, through community mining and the core of how our system works, community members are rewarded for developing/promoting the system and the community shared values. These values are the environment, human health, animal welfare, global unity and clean energy (climate change). By introducing values to money, eventually every transaction, purchase and use of ReMoneta will start to make people think about holding a dollar .v. a pound .v. ReMoneta and what it means. Do you want to support the policies and politics of the US/UK/Europe which are changing, or do you want to use a global currency, separate from these systems, which by its nature is helping to promote these positive values as well as earn you money for doing so AND has a price which is increasing, not falling in value like fiat or volatile like crypto. A system which is zero cost/ frictionless to use and driven by the community itself. Where you can now pay 0.01c micropayments for streaming, gaming, in-apps...  People are asking "How is ReMoneta different". Sometimes it needs time to explain, but this is really a completely new approach to how money and the whole global commercial system will function. A system based on rewards and driving positive values into all daily operations of using a currency and commerce.  Thanks that you always share information. It is very important for investors.     [/quote] [/quote]  Clarity and information is based on everything.

ReMoneta will be token based on their own blockchain?  We have two tokens. RET which is on the Ethereum network (access to all services and infrastructure) and ReMoneta which runs on its own adapted-Hyperledger network with all the unique benefits. See the Technical Paper on www.ReMoneta.com for more information.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: The original idea comes out of the problems from the financial crisis and improving global commerce, however, really work started at the end of 2017 when the Hyperledger solution was available and we understood how we could adapt this technology with our own ideas, to solve a lot of the current problems in crypto and fiat, such as speed of transactions transaction throughput, zero costs, stable and increasing prices not falling value over time so people always lose money, micropayments <0.1c, introducing positive values into global commerce, real concrete rewards for community members which support our activities instead of just relying on price speculation of coins or computer-based mining, amongst our other features. see the WP on www.ReMoneta.com   Quote from: Elonripeto on August 02, 2018, 11:08:16 PM the conference happening in NewYork what are we to expect https://medium.com/remoneta/remoneta-key-moderator-at-cryptoblockcon-in-new-york-fdff598f60f4   Expect a good show! I will do my best to moderate and direct some of the expert panelists to squeeze out some useful and practical nuggets of knowledge that can be used by the viewers.

Author: Franco7272
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Yes.  - A stable price does not mean a "fixed at one number" price. In the case of ReMoneta the price will show a stable increase in price. That means a predictable and stable increasing price determined by an intelligent computer model. - Based on its land holdings, there is *real* measurable value underlying the group *today* and every day, not just future promises. You are buying a token with a group that already has large value and this increases as more land is purchased - Don't forget that land values are the best asset for consistent long term value increase (see our Philosophy Paper, Oxford University study), www.ReMoneta.com - We have a Proof Of Care bonus for the private sale buyer - so you may obtain a bonus on top of your purchase. - Private sale buyers get access to 1% of all future sales through their exclusive community mining (plus another 6% of additional community mining rewards). - The community mining system is based on your own actions.. so with ReMoneta its not just speculation like other tokns, you have a really concrete and exact path to earn money *which you control yourself* - There is the chance to set up a business on the network free of charge, which can generate you as much income as you achieve - While ReMoneta has a stable price, there is a dual token system. RET is an ERC20 token running on Ethereum and is floating, so the price may increase as there is more demand. You can swap from one to the other as you choose.  So, this should help give a few ideas how you can earn with ReMoneta. As you see there are a lot more options that alternatives to earn good income.   [/quote]  [/quote]  Can you tell use more about that remoneta token,and its purpose? [/quote]  Mm, its a broad question. Lets say it like this, the goal of ReMoneta is to improve how the world works. That may be a bit philosophical (see our Philosophy Paper on www.ReMoneta.com), but I will explain it.  There are some great benefits for buyers - good possibilities to earn from bonuses, exclusive rewards for private sale buyers, community mining where you earn based on what you do, opportunities to set up a business, amongst other things. But that is only half the story.  We believe you should earn but at the same time drive positive change in the world. This happens in two ways. First the land backing means the ReMoneta token (its a dual token system, RET and ReMoneta) will help to stabilise the financial system. This is because ReMoneta has stable (predictably increasing) prices and is backed by real, measurable value - land. It is not based on loans from banks created from thin air, it is not based on future promises, countries which need to continue to grow in order to generate economic benefit or any kind of "hot air". It is based on land. You can live on it, grow crops on it... it is very real. Second, through community mining and the core of how our system works, community members are rewarded for developing/promoting the system and the community shared values. These values are the environment, human health, animal welfare, global unity and clean energy (climate change). By introducing values to money, eventually every transaction, purchase and use of ReMoneta will start to make people think about holding a dollar .v. a pound .v. ReMoneta and what it means. Do you want to support the policies and politics of the US/UK/Europe which are changing, or do you want to use a global currency, separate from these systems, which by its nature is helping to promote these positive values as well as earn you money for doing so AND has a price which is increasing, not falling in value like fiat or volatile like crypto. A system which is zero cost/ frictionless to use and driven by the community itself. Where you can now pay 0.01c micropayments for streaming, gaming, in-apps...  People are asking "How is ReMoneta different". Sometimes it needs time to explain, but this is really a completely new approach to how money and the whole global commercial system will function. A system based on rewards and driving positive values into all daily operations of using a currency and commerce.  Thanks that you always share information. It is very important for investors.     [/quote]

Author: btcEthgrand
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Yes.  - A stable price does not mean a "fixed at one number" price. In the case of ReMoneta the price will show a stable increase in price. That means a predictable and stable increasing price determined by an intelligent computer model. - Based on its land holdings, there is *real* measurable value underlying the group *today* and every day, not just future promises. You are buying a token with a group that already has large value and this increases as more land is purchased - Don't forget that land values are the best asset for consistent long term value increase (see our Philosophy Paper, Oxford University study), www.ReMoneta.com - We have a Proof Of Care bonus for the private sale buyer - so you may obtain a bonus on top of your purchase. - Private sale buyers get access to 1% of all future sales through their exclusive community mining (plus another 6% of additional community mining rewards). - The community mining system is based on your own actions.. so with ReMoneta its not just speculation like other tokns, you have a really concrete and exact path to earn money *which you control yourself* - There is the chance to set up a business on the network free of charge, which can generate you as much income as you achieve - While ReMoneta has a stable price, there is a dual token system. RET is an ERC20 token running on Ethereum and is floating, so the price may increase as there is more demand. You can swap from one to the other as you choose.  So, this should help give a few ideas how you can earn with ReMoneta. As you see there are a lot more options that alternatives to earn good income.   [/quote]  [/quote]  Can you tell use more about that remoneta token,and its purpose? [/quote]  Mm, its a broad question. Lets say it like this, the goal of ReMoneta is to improve how the world works. That may be a bit philosophical (see our Philosophy Paper on www.ReMoneta.com), but I will explain it.  There are some great benefits for buyers - good possibilities to earn from bonuses, exclusive rewards for private sale buyers, community mining where you earn based on what you do, opportunities to set up a business, amongst other things. But that is only half the story.  We believe you should earn but at the same time drive positive change in the world. This happens in two ways. First the land backing means the ReMoneta token (its a dual token system, RET and ReMoneta) will help to stabilise the financial system. This is because ReMoneta has stable (predictably increasing) prices and is backed by real, measurable value - land. It is not based on loans from banks created from thin air, it is not based on future promises, countries which need to continue to grow in order to generate economic benefit or any kind of "hot air". It is based on land. You can live on it, grow crops on it... it is very real. Second, through community mining and the core of how our system works, community members are rewarded for developing/promoting the system and the community shared values. These values are the environment, human health, animal welfare, global unity and clean energy (climate change). By introducing values to money, eventually every transaction, purchase and use of ReMoneta will start to make people think about holding a dollar .v. a pound .v. ReMoneta and what it means. Do you want to support the policies and politics of the US/UK/Europe which are changing, or do you want to use a global currency, separate from these systems, which by its nature is helping to promote these positive values as well as earn you money for doing so AND has a price which is increasing, not falling in value like fiat or volatile like crypto. A system which is zero cost/ frictionless to use and driven by the community itself. Where you can now pay 0.01c micropayments for streaming, gaming, in-apps...  People are asking "How is ReMoneta different". Sometimes it needs time to explain, but this is really a completely new approach to how money and the whole global commercial system will function. A system based on rewards and driving positive values into all daily operations of using a currency and commerce.     [/quote]  love the confidence in the response

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Hi, we do have our own blockchain.  There are 2 tokens, RET, that runs on Ethereum and ReMoneta runs on our own adapted-Hyperledger.   Quote from: snowcommander on August 01, 2018, 11:34:24 AM Quote from: Kutuzov44 on August 01, 2018, 07:48:12 AM Quote from: HadleyBarrett on August 01, 2018, 04:45:33 AM Quote from: HiLander on July 30, 2018, 04:35:39 PM Quote from: NoMoreTears on July 30, 2018, 02:49:04 PM Quote from: frcat on July 17, 2018, 11:18:08 AM If this will be stable token (or coin) what interest in investors here to invest in this project if price will could not grow?   Im sure  there will be some bonus available for all those that invest during ICO  There are various ways to gain value    Yes.  - A stable price does not mean a "fixed at one number" price. In the case of ReMoneta the price will show a stable increase in price. That means a predictable and stable increasing price determined by an intelligent computer model. - Based on its land holdings, there is *real* measurable value underlying the group *today* and every day, not just future promises. You are buying a token with a group that already has large value and this increases as more land is purchased - Don't forget that land values are the best asset for consistent long term value increase (see our Philosophy Paper, Oxford University study), www.ReMoneta.com - We have a Proof Of Care bonus for the private sale buyer - so you may obtain a bonus on top of your purchase. - Private sale buyers get access to 1% of all future sales through their exclusive community mining (plus another 6% of additional community mining rewards). - The community mining system is based on your own actions.. so with ReMoneta its not just speculation like other tokns, you have a really concrete and exact path to earn money *which you control yourself* - There is the chance to set up a business on the network free of charge, which can generate you as much income as you achieve - While ReMoneta has a stable price, there is a dual token system. RET is an ERC20 token running on Ethereum and is floating, so the price may increase as there is more demand. You can swap from one to the other as you choose.  So, this should help give a few ideas how you can earn with ReMoneta. As you see there are a lot more options that alternatives to earn good income.     Hi Hadley,do you plan Live AMA any time soon?  It would be much appreciated and would sort out a lot o possible questions from future investors.   Yes, I am open for this. Where do you suggest I do it?

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Yes, we have 2 programs at the moment: Referral program - www.ReMoneta.com/maitre - doing well right now, over 56,000 people registered Bonus program - www.ReMoneta.com/bonus - This is a Proof Of Care program, the more you do for ReMoneta, the more your bonus  Once the ReMoneta blockchain (ledger) network goes live: Community Mining - the rewards here can be very significant. They can be many times your token purchase and even better when you bought during the private sale. Again, the more you do for the ReMoneta community and the more you promote community shared values to the benefit of the world, the more your reward. This is how we believe things should work.

I will be the lead moderator at CryptoBlockCon in New York on 15th August. So, anyone who would like to meet me there, welcome!

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Yes.  - A stable price does not mean a "fixed at one number" price. In the case of ReMoneta the price will show a stable increase in price. That means a predictable and stable increasing price determined by an intelligent computer model. - Based on its land holdings, there is *real* measurable value underlying the group *today* and every day, not just future promises. You are buying a token with a group that already has large value and this increases as more land is purchased - Don't forget that land values are the best asset for consistent long term value increase (see our Philosophy Paper, Oxford University study), www.ReMoneta.com - We have a Proof Of Care bonus for the private sale buyer - so you may obtain a bonus on top of your purchase. - Private sale buyers get access to 1% of all future sales through their exclusive community mining (plus another 6% of additional community mining rewards). - The community mining system is based on your own actions.. so with ReMoneta its not just speculation like other tokns, you have a really concrete and exact path to earn money *which you control yourself* - There is the chance to set up a business on the network free of charge, which can generate you as much income as you achieve - While ReMoneta has a stable price, there is a dual token system. RET is an ERC20 token running on Ethereum and is floating, so the price may increase as there is more demand. You can swap from one to the other as you choose.  So, this should help give a few ideas how you can earn with ReMoneta. As you see there are a lot more options that alternatives to earn good income.

Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Hi everybody!   As the start of the token sale is rapidly approaching, we have published a comprehensive FAQ based on the questions sent by the community members.  It covers 4 topics:  1. General information 2. Information about token sale 3. Information about land 4. Information about community  We hope this will give you a better idea of the project. All details are in our white paper, philosophy paper, and technical paper, you can see them on ReMoneta.com. (PS! You no longer need to enter your e-mail address to access them).  Read the FAQ here: https://medium.com/remoneta/remoneta-faq-ceff7d0566c0

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: We take one month after the end of the private token sale to check the administration, make sure all numbers are correct, check bonuses, make sure everything is working.  Our approach is always consistent. It is not our plan to rush something out that is half working. Better to plan an extra month and do it properly.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: So far most people have been positive about this and understand the idea. Indeed you just swap one token for the other. Its a bit like USD and EUR. If you are in Europe, you switch your USD to EUR so you can enjoy all the European infrastructure, entertainment and so on. When you go to America, then you swap to USD. In our case, when you want to use all of the facilities of the Ethereum network, you swap to RET. When you want all the benefits of the ReMoneta network, you swap to ReMoneta. Also, the dual token approach is necessary for the price to be completely stable.   Quote from: Memmoria on July 23, 2018, 11:32:02 AM The price is stable, not volatile and is designed to increase steadily over time  How do you plan to achieve that,since cryptocurrencies are usually very volatile?   Three ways. You can see the details in the Philosophy paper on www.ReMoneta.com, but basically: Dual token approach, RET is floating, ReMoneta is not traded. This is needed to balance the economic pressures of the market. The ReMoneta price is determined by a long term intelligent computer model not market trading as above. Land provides stability, trust and security to the companies in the system. It is not leveraged and there is no risk attached. This means an income can be generated for covering costs and buyers know that the companies have a very large and real value and will not fail financially.   Quote from: Sarma on July 23, 2018, 11:41:55 AM Is Simon Cocking your team member,or an advisor?   An adviser. His rating on ICO Bench is no.1 from around 23,000. Certainly he has been involved with many ICOs and has a huge experience in the field

Author: ReMoneta
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Hello everyone!  I'm happy to see his thread has grown a lot in the recent days.   Just wanted to send you a reminder that the private token sale is going live TOMORROW at 10:00AM GMT.   The team will be available on Telegram, so if you have any urgent issues, please contact us there, and we will do our best to help you out. t.me/ReMoneta.  Couple of warnings:  * You can only buy the tokens via our website, so head to ReMoneta.com. * Do not send ETH directly from any exchanges! * When on Telegram, make sure you are speaking to admins or the actual team members. We are monitoring the channel pretty closely and so far haven't found any scammers, but as always, please be careful. * If in doubt about anything, get in touch with the admins via Telegram. We will not offer any free or bonus tokens etc outside of our referral and Proof of Care programs. Anyone offering to do so is not part of our team. * You can also check our official announcement channel, t.me/ReMonetaChannel as we will be updating that ASAP as well should there be something urgent.   I think it'll be a great day tomorrow!  - Liina

Author: IslesFan8083
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Actually the RET token will be tradeable, but ReMoneta will not. The Philosophy paper (available at www.remoneta.com) explains:  ReMoneta ERC20 Tokens (RETs) are standard ERC20 tokens which can be used on the Ethereum network and allow you to buy the currency ReMoneta when the network goes live. They may be exchanged one time per token purchased at any time into ReMoneta after the system goes live at the rate of 1 ReMoneta token = 1 ReMoneta. ReMoneta can be exchanged back into ERC20 tokens at the current free-floating exchange rate on the market at the time.

Author: ReMoneta
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Hi! I think something went missing in translation.  We ask people to submit their Proof of Care (bonus) information at least 14 days before the end of the token sale. KYC should not take 14 days, no. We have 2 options for KYC as well, one is powered by IdentityMind Global and the other is a regular passport + photo check. It should be pretty straightforward in most cases.  -Liina

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Hi, there has been heavy demand to date. Both from whitelisting and interest across the different forums, we believe the target is going to be achieved pretty quickly. If this surprisingly does not happen, I will write here about our Plan B.   Quote from: johnmiles on July 20, 2018, 07:54:08 AM Where exactly is your team stationed,do you have some headquarter ?  yes, we are based in the European Union, Estonia.  Quote from: btcEthgrand on July 20, 2018, 11:18:06 PM Quote from: IslesFan8083 on July 20, 2018, 06:53:35 PM Quote from: JeffTheMan on July 20, 2018, 01:10:06 PM Quote from: Ajutokintumi on July 20, 2018, 08:32:42 AM I heared something about partnership with Bancor.Is is true?  Not sure, I haven't heard a thing, would be nice if someone has some source to share this info with us .  It has been confirmed, yes! The official announcement of the partnership is here: https://medium.com/remoneta/remoneta-ret-token-to-join-the-bancor-network-e8dae083d84  what exactly will the partnership mean for ReMoneta ?  This will mean the RET token is integrated with the Bancor network. This gives liquidty for the RET token (on the Ethereum network) and allows people to leverage this infrastructure to swap their token and use more functionality of different tokens on Ethereum. ReMoneta remains the stable, secure currency on the ReMoneta network and is not traded, so you gain additional benefits through this integration.   Quote from: bitmonkey455 on July 21, 2018, 07:20:21 AM  How does the bonus program work ? Do i have to finish them before i buy the tokens ? i saw it took like 14 days to be confirmed, and that's pretty long time...  It can be done as quickly or slowly as you like - only you must submit proofs 14 days before the end of the token sale, see www.ReMoneta.com/bonus You can buy tokens first or do the bonus first and buy later. My recommendation is to start with the bonus now to get maximum time to do it and therefore maximum bonus.  Quote from: TheRedKing on July 21, 2018, 10:32:39 AM Quote from: bitmonkey455 on July 21, 2018, 07:20:21 AM How does the bonus program work ? Do i have to finish them before i buy the tokens ? i saw it took like 14 days to be confirmed, and that's pretty long time...  If it's KYC then yes, it can take a long time to get approved. I know it's up to a couple of days (and that's still long) but 14 days is really strange. Maybe someone from the team can clarify this.  Its not 14 days. It could be less than a minute if it goes through directly with IdentityMind. Just in case, you can plan to leave 48 hours to be sure of any eventuality. In my view 48 hours is overkill, but better plan longer and then get it done quicker in reality.   Quote from: Crazy_Heart on July 21, 2018, 06:13:59 AM Do you have some video guide that explains how to join the sale,how to go trough whole procedure?   Yes, there will be. But actually as someone else wrote, it is the same approach as other projects using an ICO cabinet.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Hi,  The Proof Of Care is the bonus applied on top of the tokens you buy during the token sale. So it is rewarding people for doing something good for the project as well. You can see all the bonuses and actions on www.ReMoneta.com/bonus  The Community Mining (instead of computer power/ electricity in normal mining) starts once the ReMoneta network goes live. This is somehow a similar concept, in that you take certain actions (like bringing new members, retailers, admin/coding for the system) and promoting the community shared values (environment, human health, global unity, animal welfare, clean energy). You submit your works to the community, who give them votes. You are rewarded according to votes - so, how useful the activity is to the community. So, you are rewarded for concrete actions you take supporting the community and promoting its values.    Quote from: banaynay on July 19, 2018, 02:48:08 PM Quote from: Ajutokintumi on July 19, 2018, 07:15:29 AM  Quote from: totiriti333 on July 18, 2018, 09:12:33 PM Quote from: Lognak on July 18, 2018, 09:11:13 PM Quote from: totiriti333 on July 18, 2018, 09:05:49 PM  My guess is it will be the number of referral. But this a pretty good question actually. It's not clearly stated in the link in their site.  It is not quite clear - but wouldn't every referal be rewarded even a little bit?  It's 100 tokens per referral  Is there some maximum one can earn trough referral system?  I'm also interested in this - is there a possible limit to the bonus?  The only limit is the end of the referral program (so better to start earlier). Every referral which leads to a new registration receives a reward. People are rewarded for the real work they do. That is our basic ethic in ReMoneta. To be open, fair and reward people for what they do which supports the community.    Quote from: Che6ir61 on July 19, 2018, 07:27:46 AM Give more information about the bounty would like to see the conditions of participation  The referral program can be found on www.ReMoneta.com/maitre

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Ok, there are a few ways to answer this.  First up, we have a dual token system. RET is floating (the price can change on its own), ReMoneta is stable and that is your surety. The system works with these two tokens. So that answers the question whether or not there could be a price rise.  Stable does not mean the price is exactly fixed at one number. "Stable growth" is stable, but not always the same number. It grows. The computer model keeps the ReMoneta price stable and predictable.  It is a risky strategy to invest in a token and only hope the price will go up (price speculation) based on some future development. ReMoneta solves one of the big problems in Crypto - crashing prices. Its much better to buy a token which has a concrete way to earn. if there is also some future development, you have the best of both worlds. ReMoneta has this concrete way to earn:  With ReMoneta we have community mining. This is our form of "mining" which uses no computing power or electricity. Instead you take actions to support the community (admin/code, bring new retailers or members) and promote the community's shared values (environment, human health, animal welfare, global unity, clean energy). These are real concrete actions you take yourself which lead to rewards and the whole system is coordinated by the community. More info in the Philosophy Paper, www.ReMoneta.com.  Within the ReMoneta network you may set up your own code, system or business. There is no cost at all to do this. That's another way to earn.  The private sale has a number of Bonus options based on your own actions. Nice for earning.  The purpose of ReMoneta is to be used for buying and selling. Saving costs its not earning, but because there are no joining fees, transaction costs or fees, you spend less. Money is money...  So, there were just a few ways to practically earn from ReMoneta...

Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: The idea was simply that then we could keep everyone who is interested up to date with the progress without them needing to search around over the internet to find the material they want.  For myself, I read a large amount of information. Very often I go to a site or read some article or information, it was very interesting, but then I don't save the name or the place and I want to find it a few weeks later, but I can't. I don't mind some extra emails if it is something I am interested in.  However, it is the community which drives ReMoneta, so during the next IT update, we are making the change that the WP can be downloaded without any email.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Hi! There is a lot of information available on the website, www.ReMoneta.com front page, scroll to the bottom. White paper, Philosophy Paper, Technical Paper... WP is short, but the Technical Paper is 50 pages if you want to really go into details. Hopefully enough reading!  Quote from: Sengjen on July 15, 2018, 07:35:36 AM Quote from: BoDerek on July 15, 2018, 06:26:31 AM Quote from: shakerbitcoin on July 14, 2018, 11:04:14 PM Quote from: Dr. Van Nostrand on July 14, 2018, 07:36:32 PM Can you share us token allocation info?  Token Allocation: - Allocated 10% directly, remainder split evenly across 6 months - 50% directly and 50% monthly over 2 years - 50% directly, and 50% with a 3 month lock-in - 6 month lock-in and an allocation split monthly across 2 years  So wahts the longest period that tokens will be locked?  From this post it seems that it is 6 months without allocation and no distribution at all.Correct me if I'm wrong.  Its clearer to read on the website. Basically for the private sale token buyers, distribution starts 30 days after the end of the private sale (to allow for admin), then its equally distributed across the next 6 months so there is no large influx of supply to the market.  The 6 month lock in and spread across 2 years is for the founders and team, to make sure we are in this project for the long term. We only win when the project wins for everyone.

Author: iBTT2
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Also, the Remoneta group is backed by a physical commodity, they have a globally diversified land portfolio. Historically, land has been the single most sought after asset a person could have, exceeding even gold in importance and perception. Land is a symbol of wellbeing and wealth. Throughout the centuries, productive land has not only preserved its real value but also increased it due to population growth and technological advances. Land is a non-depreciating asset,  it does not lose value due to physical or moral depreciation as other goods used in barter trading typically do, it increases in value. Land has intrinsic value of its own.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Hello all,  First up, thanks to our great BitCoinTalk community for all the support and positive words! Together we will change the world guys  Its only 10 days countdown to the private sale which opens on 24th July 10:00 GMT!!  Here is a summary of some unique features of ReMoneta:  ReMoneta is very different from other tokens available. Key differences are: - combining all the features below, we bring Crypto to the mainstream - completely stable pricing, avoids falling values in crypto and fiat (dollar/Euro/Pound) - allows micropayments opening up a new industry (imagine 0.1c/s for streaming video or 0.2c for buying a gem on games) with faster throughput than other systems - ReMoneta companies are backed by land, as far as we know the only currency that exists like this (fiat or crypto) and certainly no major ones - zero transaction costs, zero joining costs, zero fees, no costs at all - a totally frictionless hub connecting Crypto with Commerce - near-instant transactions and a huge scaling of transactions for micropayments using time-sliced consolidation - no need to rely on speculation and price rises - very large concrete earnings possible through community mining which uses no computing power or electricity so it is equal for everyone and fair - community members are rewarded by promoting real world values (environment, human health, clean energy, animal welfare, global unity) and the ReMoneta community - retailers are rewarded for joining the network and according to the number of transactions they make - Follow-the-money security, not done elsewhere - Anyone/anywhere/anytime access to blockchain for everyone with an internet connection  ..much more about this can be found in our WP on www.ReMoneta.com and our channel t.me/ReMoneta or t.me/ReMonetaChannel

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Good to hear. We look forwards to have you as a solid member of our community! Soft cap = hard cap = $5,000,000 = 50,000,000,000 RETs   Quote from: positiveoutlook on July 14, 2018, 08:15:11 AM Quote from: Kryptoking21 on July 14, 2018, 07:28:32 AM Is RET erc20 or erc223 token?  I hope it's ERC20 because those can go on my hardware wallet.   Yep, its ERC20.   Quote from: BoDerek on July 14, 2018, 06:39:11 AM Can you tell me more about the team,what are your previous projects?   This is a long answer. You can read some good background of the team in the WP and Philosophy document on www.ReMoneta.com, but summary is, ReMoneta is combining the fields of Real Estate, Finance and technology (ReFinTech) to create a completely new currency (bringing crypto to the mainstream and connecting crypto to commerce). The team and advisers background is exactly this. Many years experience in the real estate, finance and technology fields (including crypto - we some very experienced guys on board). Experience of ICOs, development. The two founders, myself and Harijs have both managed large value projects over a long period. I own and have lead various companies in real estate, finance, media, technology and especially been in at the start of different industries, like disaggregated solar in the UK (first national market leader), bulletin boards (that was a while ago for anyone who remembers!), sustainable real estate for over 14 years. Harijs has his own 80m Euro investment fund and has been Chairman of a major bank and leader of a central bank - its very useful to know how it works "inside" the system so we can change the system.   Quote from: fivestarBTC on July 14, 2018, 12:03:45 AM the regulation in the region you plan on operating from is it crypto friendly ?   Is any country really crypto friendly . The operating company is in the European Union - Estonia. Estonia is well known for IT and new technologies and the system is quite flexible. We have done a full in-depth legal analysis with the no.1 legal company in the region, Sorainan, who I have worked with for years, so legally everything is as sure as it can be in this market (which is changing every week).

Author: Desmozgenes
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Can you please name few key features that will separate ReMoneta from other similar payments system,some features that will give you an advantage over competition?

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Yes.. to really get all the details you need to download the Philosophy Paper, www.ReMoneta.com. But basically it goes like this: Normal mining uses a lot of electricity (bad for the environment) and it favours people with a lot of money to buy big computers. That's not fair and not good. We want a system which is fair for all, doesn't matter how much money you have, how big a computer and which not only gives a financial reward, but also does some good for the world. So, to do the mining you take real world actions, like promoting the values which our community shares (environment, human health, clean energy, animal welfare, global unity) and promoting the community (bringing new retailers, members, supporting other community members...). These actions you post in the system we are developing for that and you are rewarded according to the value to the community, decided by the community.   For anyone interested in some more info, have a look at Medium.com/ReMoneta - we have a whole series of articles there about ReMoneta, the financial system, how things work differently and what is possible. Each week another few articles go online.   Quote from: Desmozgenes on July 14, 2018, 07:24:50 PM Can you please name few key features that will separate ReMoneta from other similar payments system,some features that will give you an advantage over competition?  Yes. Zero cost (paypal, BTC, ETH... all have some fees somewhere), micropayments (completely new industry), instant and high number of transactions, complete stability of pricing, follow-the-money security, no cost to transfer between users, linking crypto to commerce... with a bit more detail below  - combining all the features below, we bring Crypto to the mainstream - completely stable pricing, avoids falling values in crypto and fiat (dollar/Euro/Pound) - allows micropayments opening up a new industry (imagine 0.1c/s for streaming video or 0.2c for buying a gem on games) with faster throughput than other systems - ReMoneta companies are backed by land, as far as we know the only currency that exists like this (fiat or crypto) and certainly no major ones - zero transaction costs, zero joining costs, zero fees, no costs at all - a totally frictionless hub connecting Crypto with Commerce - near-instant transactions and a huge scaling of transactions for micropayments using time-sliced consolidation - no need to rely on speculation and price rises - very large concrete earnings possible through community mining which uses no computing power or electricity so it is equal for everyone and fair - community members are rewarded by promoting real world values (environment, human health, clean energy, animal welfare, global unity) and the ReMoneta community - retailers are rewarded for joining the network and according to the number of transactions they make  ..see our Philosophy paper on www.ReMoneta.com and our channel t.me/ReMoneta or t.me/ReMonetaChannel

Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Hello all,  I need to emphasise again, we are not based on Ethereum: we have a dual token system. ReMoneta and RET. ReMoneta runs on our own blockchain (the ReMoneta network) and the RET token runs on Ethereum. So, it is the best of both worlds. You have functionality and immediate access to all of Ethereum and all the unique features of the ReMoneta network (not in any other project).  More info on www.ReMoneta.com and t.me/ReMoneta

Author: ReMoneta
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: There is no operational effect from falling land prices. The price is based on a long term machine intelligent computer model, land price itself actually does not affect it. The point of land backing is that it gives stability, surety and value to the whole system, but even if the land price does fall, it won't impact the price. Having said that, land prices have been shown to always increase over long term (the Philosophy paper refers to a 200 year study made by Oxford Univeristy), so any sort of short term fluctuations in land prices will only impact a number of the balance sheet.   Quote from: Maurizio7878 on July 12, 2018, 09:54:33 AM Do you plan to open other offices in Europe or on other continents?  We will most likely down the road, yes.   -Liina
