Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: We are using our own blockchain - the ReMoenta network. The technical solution has a dual token system. ReMoneta which runs on the ReMoneta network and RET (ReMoneta ERC20 Token) which runs on Ethereum. You may swap in and out of the tokens, so you get the benefits and best of both systems. It is also a fundamental part of our stability and flexibility. You can find more detail on this in the WhitePaper and Philosopy Paper on www.ReMoneta.com.    Quote from: MadEth on July 12, 2018, 12:43:40 AM Quote from: thorRJ on July 12, 2018, 12:27:55 AM Are the rewards only for Members and retailers? Because being a payment processor, the customer that uses ReMoneta to pay, will not be rewarded? that is a good question  waiting to read the response from team... sure they would make it a fair reward system  The rewards for community members are based on our system called "Community mining". Throughout all aspects of the project, the people rewarded are those who are most active in supporting the community and the community values. In the token sale phase that is Proof Of Care (www.ReMoneta.com/bonus), where you show your involvement by promoting and supporting the project. During the project phase, community mining is again by taking actions to promote our values (environment, clean energy, animal welfare, human health and global unity) as well as supporting the community by new retailers, members on board and supporting the system with admin actions and development.  Everyone can participate, everyone is equal, it is all fair. It does not use electricity or computing power to do this mining, so no benefit if you have a lot of money to buy a powerful computer, also that helps the environment. The reward is based on your own activities and their value to the community.  These actions are rewarded in the system. You can read more about that in the Philosophy doc on www.ReMoneta.com, down at the bottom of the front page.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: About Proof Of Care. Anyone can participate, it is not limited to certain level members because we have our own verification. Everyone puts their results into the website, www.ReMoneta.com/bonus and we can verify.  We have not limited languages, but we do need to be able to verify the work. All main languages are covered. If you would like to use an unknown language, please check with us on t.me/ReMoneta and we will get back to you.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Hi, we have an interesting system for this. It combines three features. There is a long term machine intelligent model determining the price, there is a dual token system, RET which floats and ReMoneta which is not traded and land backing giving stability to the general system. Finally this means ReMoneta will have a completely stable price. You can find the details in the Philosophy paper on the website www.ReMoneta.com  Quote from: kalehon on July 11, 2018, 06:24:42 PM Do you plan to participate in conferences and meetings with investors. Can you hear about your project from the speakers?  Yes, we will attend different events and do a roadshow. We are setting up the plan now, so if you have particular events that you would like us to participate in, please let us know on t.me/ReMoneta. We also opened a telegram announcement Channel. You can also follow announcements on the channel t.me/ReMonetaChannel.

Author: iBTT2
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Proof of care bonus means rewards based on how much you care about the project by taking actions to support it.  In other words, unlike a normal bounty wherein you are just basically helping to promote the project, but you may or may not actually invest or contribute.  So, the proof of care bonus is actually giving back to the actual community that supports it, because they've really invested or contributed to the project.

Author: UniversalChallenges
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: I like the idea of a global commerece and that all these retailers and partners can use ReMoneta's (universal currency). From the white paper I see that you have bounty program for the community members but this is more focused on spreading the word. I was wondering what kind of bounty program do you offer for people who can connect you with certain big retailers/partners? I think it is quite challenging to get to see some decision makers of Amazon or some other big players and introduce your currency/micropayments system, but since it is a community mining then people know people.... and many people have businesses as well that may want to use ReMoneta as a currency. So have you thought of "using" community for getting the partners/retailers on board and what sort of bounty program you offer for them?

Author: ReMoneta
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: We have a dual token system. The private sale that starts on July 24th is for our ReMoneta ERC20 token (RET). Once our network goes live in April 2019, you can swap them 1:1 to ReMonetas, our own currency. So yes, we will have our own.  Quote from: hyunpark on July 10, 2018, 09:43:33 PM Quote from: Vindizzle on July 10, 2018, 09:19:17 PM Remoneta is a new stable currency with a well thought of and well rounded plan and system ensuring us a stability and development through the years to come and I see it as a serious long term investment.  Very interesting concept to ensure success. Will keep eye on the project whitepaper.  You can right now download our White Paper from ReMoneta.com. Scroll down and you will see the White paper, Philosophy, and Technical paper.  Quote from: SillyCryptoX on July 10, 2018, 09:50:13 PM Quote from: crownjewel on July 09, 2018, 07:50:34 PM Woop, found this early, nice! Any plans for a bounty?  waiting also for ways to earn  Remoneta Token   You can earn bonuses already! See here: http://remoneta.com/bonus. It is not a bounty as such, but it is a Proof of Care bonus system and everyone is welcome to join. Whenever ready, submit your Proof of Care information via the above link.  Quote from: Londondungeon on July 10, 2018, 11:16:17 PM Quote from: Vindizzle on July 10, 2018, 09:19:17 PM Remoneta is a new stable currency with a well thought of and well rounded plan and system ensuring us a stability and development through the years to come and I see it as a serious long term investment.  Definitely a long term project and potential might be really significant to change some things when it comes to crypto.I would not call Remoneta a possible disruptor, quite contrary looks it could be a stabilizer. This reminded me of Denzel suddenly  Get Denzel to be the face of Remoneta to be our stabilizer!!!  Contact me if you can hook it up!    I hope I did not miss any questions. Our CEO is fairly active on this thread as well, so he will keep an eye on it. Thank you for the questions so far, feel free to let us know if there are any more.  Liina

Author: shakerbitcoin
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: To earn community mining and loyalty bonus, it is necessary to hold a ReMoneta value equivalent to $100 or more in your wallet.  And this is what I've gathered from their Whitepaper:  Mining rewards do not come from computing power like Bitcoin, they come from promoting positive global values. After each token is sold, a total of 7% of new ReMoneta sold is reserved for this program.  This program aligns financial reward with promotion of ReMoneta and positive global values. So, by mining, our members help to change the world for the better, increase the take-up of ReMoneta and are financially rewarded for doing so.  The mining and incentive system has currently four ways to be rewarded with new ReMoneta, namely: 1. Finance the world 2. Spread the word 3. Build the community 4. Increase the members

Author: Philip Ruby
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: In Remoneta the idea is that anyone can participate and earn bonus. They call their program proof of care, which is a bounty program equivalent. And anyone can earn based on their action in the real world, it is not based on having a status of jr. member or so, but your own contribution and activity. They are also pretty active on Telegram chat to answer questions.

Author: Rooooooooon
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Here's the proof of care table, in case anyone want to check it out Tier 1 10% at least 5 social media posts Tier 2 20% at least 5 blog posts or infographics Tier 3 25% at least 3 videos made and shared Tier 4 30% outreach to communities with 20k+ members and writing an article, QA or AMA session with them Tier 5 40% outreach to communities with 50k+ members and writing an article, QA or AMA session with them Tier 6 60% (and potential partnership) hosting/ participating in blockchain events and presenting the project live to a large audience

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Key differences are: - completely stable pricing, avoids falling values in crypto and fiat - allows micropayments opening up a new industry (imagine 0.1c/s for streaming video or 0.2c for buying a gem on games) - ReMoneta companies are backed by land, as far as we know the only currency that exists like this (fiat or crypto) and certainly no major ones - zero transaction costs, zero joining costs, zero fees, no costs at all - near-instant transactions and a huge scaling of transactions for micropayments using time-sliced consolidation - community mining uses no computing power or electricity so it is equal for everyone and fair - community members are rewarded by promoting real world values (environment, human health, clean energy, animal welfare, global unity) and the ReMoneta community - Follow-the-money security - Anyone/anywhere/anytime access for everyone with an internet connection - Very good earning potential for community mining. Its not at all about speculation, there is a concrete earning path  ..much more about this can be found in our WP on www.ReMoneta.com  To buy tokens, go to ReMoneta.com and click “Buy Tokens”. The private sale starts on 24th July, but you can register now. To join our community, go to t.me/ReMoneta and join the group. Everyone is welcome. That is where the team is most active in communicating. Articles can be found on Medium.com/ReMoneta  Quote from: Elonripeto on July 10, 2018, 05:14:05 PM have ReMoneta considered scalability issues that could be an issue with Blockchain system!! if you are going for a global accepted currency that should be looked at  Definitely yes. We have created a solution we call "time-sliced consolidation" it allows very large scaling for micropayments. Considerably more transactions at the micro level than in other cryptos.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Like it should be - we are in for the long term, not a short term cash grab. As the ReMoneta network grows and expands in the longer term then we continue to be rewarded. The percentage may be small at the start, but over the long term it will become very valuable.

Just for everyone's information, we (ReMoneta) did not place this information and at the current time it is not all correct/ various things are missing. Hopefully in the future we can confirm the entry once all information has been corrected. Keep watching this space.  For all correct information, see our website www.ReMoneta.com and join our channels such as t.me/ReMoneta.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Sure. The patent is for the network system and how it all works together creating a unique solution. For instance the stability, micropayments, backing, incorporating real world values into the technology, machine modelling and some technical details. As traditionally, we will still be open source for all the community coding, drive and development. The idea behind this is to protect our community from the large banks, corporates and government.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: The private sale starts 24th July. There has been a lot of interest so we are expecting a fast close.  Quote from: HorseMajor on July 10, 2018, 12:20:15 AM Is the project about creating new currency online? why don't we just work with Bitcoin or Ethereum, what would make the currency you creating more efficient?  It does many things Bitcoin and Ethereum can't do. See my answer below - ReMoneta is very different from other tokens available. Key differences are: - completely stable pricing, avoids falling values in crypto and fiat - allows micropayments opening up a new industry (imagine 0.1c/s for streaming video or 0.2c for buying a gem on games) - ReMoneta companies are backed by land, as far as we know the only currency that exists like this (fiat or crypto) and certainly no major ones - zero transaction costs, zero joining costs, zero fees, no costs at all - near-instant transactions and a huge scaling of transactions for micropayments using time-sliced consolidation - community mining uses no computing power or electricity so it is equal for everyone and fair - community members are rewarded by promoting real world values (environment, human health, clean energy, animal welfare, global unity) and the ReMoneta community - Follow-the-money security - Anyone/anywhere/anytime access for everyone with an internet connection  ..much more about this can be found in our WP on www.ReMoneta.com and our channel t.me/ReMoneta

Author: shakerbitcoin
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: This is actually a very interesting bonus incentive to have built-in on ReMoneta's ecosystem. Based on their Whitepaper, the mining and incentive system has currently four ways to be rewarded with new ReMoneta. This program aligns financial reward with promotion of ReMoneta and positive global values.  So, by mining, members help to change the world for the better, increase the take-up of ReMoneta and are financially rewarded for doing so. The four ways are: 1. Finance the world 2. Spread the word 3. Build the community 4. Increase the members

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: The price is determined using a long term model and the companies in the group are backed by land. There is a dual token model, RET and ReMoneta. The RET floats and the ReMoneta is not traded - it runs only on the ReMoneta network. The effect of this is that the currency price is completely stable (more than fiat, let alone crypto) and the land gives trust, security, safety and real value already today, rather than a promise of some technology development in the future. Of course we are developing the network, so there is development, but a calculable value exists at any time since there is real land there.  NB:it is a currency not a fund/security/investment.

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: ReMoneta is very different from other tokens available. Key differences are: - completely stable pricing, avoids falling values in crypto and fiat - allows micropayments opening up a new industry (imagine 0.1c/s for streaming video or 0.2c for buying a gem on games) - ReMoneta companies are backed by land, as far as we know the only currency that exists like this (fiat or crypto) and certainly no major ones - zero transaction costs, zero joining costs, zero fees, no costs at all - near-instant transactions and a huge scaling of transactions for micropayments using time-sliced consolidation - community mining uses no computing power or electricity so it is equal for everyone and fair - community members are rewarded by promoting real world values (environment, human health, clean energy, animal welfare, global unity) and the ReMoneta community - Follow-the-money security - Anyone/anywhere/anytime access for everyone with an internet connection  ..much more about this can be found in our WP on www.ReMoneta.com  We also have exclusive community mining (12.5% of the total to be mined) for token sale buyers as well as other pretty nice options for the private sale.  To buy tokens, go to ReMoneta.com and click “Buy Tokens”. The private sale starts on 24th July, but you can register now. To join our community, go to t.me/ReMoneta and join the group. Everyone is welcome. That is where the team is most active in communicating. Our WP and other materials are available on www.ReMoneta.com Articles can be found on Medium.com/ReMoneta

Author: HadleyBarrett
Title: [ANN] [RET] ReMoneta - a uniquely stable, reward-based online payment currency
Body: Yes, there is a simple KYC procedure. Any serious token planning a long term future should have KYC these days (regulations unfortunately). .... Quote from: crownjewel on July 09, 2018, 07:50:34 PM Woop, found this early, nice! Any plans for a bounty?  Keep a watch on this thread, there are some nice options coming up for earning tokens  ... Quote from: Vargistkrieg on July 09, 2018, 07:57:19 PM I'm not really familiar with all the terminology, but what is passive income for retailers?  Passive income is income without needing to do anything. In ReMoneta there are a few different retailer bonuses, one bonus is received by being connected to the ReMoneta network and offering your product for sale using ReMoneta. That is passive. A second example is a bonus for selling more products using the ReMoneta currency. That is active because the retailer needs to do something to earn it. ..... Quote from: Gwiazdooka on July 09, 2018, 08:06:26 PM According to your roadmap,you plan to have private sale this month.Can you tell me how much you plan to raise during that phase,and what exactly are requirements in order to join?  Hi, I answered the first part above. The second, go to our community on t.me/ReMoneta or our website www.ReMoneta.com and you are welcome to join! .... Quote from: FrankDTank on July 09, 2018, 08:12:42 PM When exactly you started with the project,for how long is in the development?  We started thinking about it a long time ago but the technology was not available to do what we wanted to do. You can say we became more active from 2017 and started to practically drive the project forwards.  .... To buy tokens, go to ReMoneta.com and click “Buy Tokens”. The private sale starts on 24th July, but you can register now. To join our community, go to t.me/ReMoneta and join the group. Everyone is welcome. That is where the team is most active in communicating. Our WP and other materials are available on www.ReMoneta.com Articles can be found on Medium.com/ReMoneta
